content: How do I link to a subfolder or file within the S3 bucket? We will need to do that from minutes and project pages or this will not be useable
You will need to copy the link from the folder or sub-folder. Unfortunately you won't be able to search and find the file inside of the folders in the S3 bucket.
Is that ever going to be fixed? Seems like an essential usability feature for a shared document storage system.
I tried copying the link, and that did not work
